discourse_list.title: TechOps Office Hours - Last Friday of the month 2:30pm UTC

content.content: TechOps Office Hours   When? Last Friday of the month 2:30pm UTC (15:30 Berlin / 14:30 London / 9:30 New York / 6:30 San Francisco)  Where?  Google Meet joining link: https://meet.google.com/dtd-hjjz-wvz Or phone numbers: https://tel.meet/dtd-hjjz-wvz?pin=1670550770575  Event details  TechOps Core Unit will be hosting monthly office hours with Maker Community on the last Friday of each month to share news, updates, answer questions, etc. We plan a format where every time we will cover one bigger topic and then share other updates and answer Community questions. If you have any requests of the topics you want to hear about during events, please let me know.  Schedule  The first event will happen on:  Friday, 27 January 2023, 2:30 pm UTC

TechOps Core Unit will be hosting the second open Office Hours session with MakerDAO Community this Friday 24 Feb 14:30-15:30 UTC. We plan to cover two topics:  How we run and maintain Keepers to monitor Maker protocol. Go through our updated budget.  And then answering questions. Everybody is welcome! Event URL - https://meet.google.com/dtd-hjjz-wvz (it’s also in Community Google Calendar and MakerDAO Discord Event).
